content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from a trip to nashville, tn with a friend who was driving.  i was looking at my friend, and as i looked at her to the west, behind her through the drivers window this light started to form way up in the heavens, and this light caught my eye, and it started making a zig zag until it touched the lower hemishere and while i was looking at it, it was this bright yellow, amber light in the center of the whole core of this object and red flashing fire or energy was coming off this.  it looked hot and intense and i knew it wasn't lightning, as lightning doesn't go in this perfect form of a zig zag, and the color was not consistent with lightning and this red flashing off this was not consistent with lightning. then i asked my friend to take the temp reading outside the car, and she did and it was 26 degrees, too cool for lightning.  and it disapeared as suddenly as it began.  it was nothing i have ever experienced before and i did report this to the daviess county sheriff's office.  this experience did really upset me, as i was unable to explain this phenomina in my own mind.
content.summary: Bright yellow zig zag light in middle, with red flash of fire or energy coming off its core from the western night sky on the willaim natcher parkway heading north to owensboro, ky.

content.detailedDescription:
my friend and i were at my house on i think oct 3rd. it was about 8:20 pm and we were looking at the stars. we were getting tired so we were heading in. we were going down my driveway to the house when we saw a yellow glowing oval object to the south. it came up from behind the trees but like when something comes over the horizon, so not directly behind them. we stopped and watched it rise up. when i put my arm up it was about the size of my pinkie nail. it came up about a thumb length and just stayed there for about a minute. then it began to flash. it did this for about a half a minute. then it completely disappeared for about 10 seconds then it came back but not as the glowing
object but as flashing lights. the lights were red, blue,green,yellow,and white.It stayed in the same place for about half a minute the started to move to the left or east of our position. it moved very slowing at first them went very fast and went the same distance in half the time.
      at first we saw it we thought it was a hot air balloon or some sort of fireworks. we were very interested and a little cautious. i thought about getting my camera but didn't want to miss it. 
      then we got a little scared because when it got to the point when it was almost straight east of us we looked back at the place in the sky that it came form and saw another one it came up in the same fashion but took less time to flash and turn into the flashing lights. the one that was flashing turned into the flashing lights and went in the opposite direction of the first one and disappeared. 
     while the second one was coming up and flashing another two came up in the same way and went off in opposite directions. when they were all gone we went in the house and called my science teacher. he didn't know what it might be and told us to contact the local authorities. i called the none emergency center and reported the incident. they told me that they would send a person out the next day. they never came or called back.
well that is my ufo account.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval in shape bright yellow almost white flashed a few times.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in front of a friends garage when i happened to look up and saw a star like objectthat moved in a straight formation towards the north i asked him if he could see it and by that very time just as i asked him what it was the object faded out and was unseen very strange i was only suppose to pick up 2 tire's for my mother's car i have seen my shair of ufo's over the summer but not thinking they would be out in the cold weather i guess i assumed wrong now they can bee seen at any time i wasn't going to report this one but it was so over whelming to me to see one again if anyone could contact me with the same report my email is wright10301973@gmail.Com
content.summary: I stopped to but used tire's when i stopped at the person's house we were talking and i happen to look up and i saw this bright star object  heading north over the mountain

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the super bowl pre game show on nbc and ther was an interview of faith hill and shortly after that there was a shot of the american flag from below and right in the center of the screen there was a opening in the clouds . well an object came into view at the top of the  opening in the clouds right below the flag and  it traveled from top to the bottom of the screen at a very high rate of speed. i was recording it and have the recording still and have watched it a few time and i cannot make it out the shape. i know that there was a now fly zone over the stadium at this time so there should not have been any plane traffic in this area. it may have been a plane but it left no con trail which almost all aircraft do leave at the altitude that this craft was traveling. i cannot give you a copy of the recording as it is on my cable box dvr and also there are some copy right issues here that deal with the nfl.
content.summary: During the super bowl pre-game show an object shot across the screen at very high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw and reported a ufo on february 8, 2009 to mufon.  i reported the object broke apart and rejoined and was illuminated bright white like a star the entire time.  after doing some research on the internet, i think the craft i saw was either a flat top or saturn - like ufo.   maybe a conical - hat or a dome shaped.  

according to what i have read on the internet, these shapes can be hard to distinguish because a halo surronds the craft.  i read the types i mentioned above have been reported as being illuminated bright white.  i don't know about other sightings of them breaking apart and rejoining.  these / the craft were silent.  when the object broke apart it could be considerd chevron - like or airplane - like (both objects). 

just wanted to add this to my description.  i do not wnat my name on the internet, but have no problem being contacted by a mufon representative.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo seen in caseyville, il at far oaks golf course.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at 9:40 pm (feb. 16, 2009) kim and i stepped out onto the deck for a few minutes before retiring for the night. we were both looking up at the stars and constellations when suddenly kim exclaimed, ��� look at those lights. they just suddenly turned on. all of a sudden they just came on.���  while she was talking and pointing i looked and saw three bright lights that had the appearance of powerful mercury vapor lights, which emitted a yellowish-white-orange color in a downward direction as if mounted underneath something. i was surprised at the sight because i think i have seen most aircraft light configuration, but this was strange. she said that it must be an airplane. it was moving toward us, but it was too large to be moving too slow. i told her to keep watching while i went for the camera. when i returned within ten seconds it had moved almost straight above us at about 10 -11 o���clock angle. as i started to take a shot it began to dim, and i told her that it was going to fade out��� but it:  brightened again for 2 to 3 seconds, went out for a couple seconds, came back on for 3 to 4 seconds, went out again for a couple seconds, then a very dim red and green light came on and stayed on. then i was totally confused because no. 1) this object is moving even slower than an ultra-light plane.  no. 2) the on and off light sequence was atypical of common air traffic in our area.  no. 3) the sudden appearance of these ominous bright yellowish lights at less than a mile away. and lastly, the fact that it had red-and-green navigation lights, not to mention there was no sound at all. kim and i both concluded that the behavior definitely was not that of an airplane. maybe it could have been a blimp at low altitude, but it is a violation to navigate without lights. 

i snapped off four pictures but my digital was set at 400 iso and the lights smeared leaving them totally useless. i resolved to believe that it was an airplane until i decided to see if any like sightings had been reported. bingo, i found one on mufon submitted 2-17-2009 from ohio, which has a ���craft.Jpg��� illustration. it appears to have the same lighting and behavior that we witnessed.
content.summary: Extremely slow moving multiple bright lights with low altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was thirteen we lived out five miles south-west of hobart. on a saturday night i missed my ride home so me and a friend descided  waik to my house so we started to waik about 12.30 am i live in hobart okl  the house south west of town ok we started walking about a mile and ahale my friend needed a cigatette so he knocked on these people house that lived a half mile  outside of town. i stayed up the road dogs were barking but not at me and i could hear a strange noise in the sky so i was looking around and i couldnt see nothing so my friend got back with his cigerette and we started walking on down the road so now we are about two and ahale mile out of town on a dirt road. so im am looking up in the sky it is dark very dark away a distance i can see a red light in the sky i goes right it goes left and then all of the sudden it is right in front of us bout thirty feet in front of us it is hoovern right about tree level we both come to a stop i say to my self it is not from this world my freind takes off runnin and iam froze standing still i look down the road he is running i look back up iam right in the middle of this round ufo iam looking staright up in it it lights me up i cant run im still froze i do not know if scared that i cant move but im looking right in it in the center but if lights me up so i start to pray and i said a prayer thats when i was able to run so till this day i do not know how long i was under that light but i believe this thing had ubducted me cause i have had two other inconters ive believe they have done somthing to me. so i ask please please for some help so i do not think iam crazy. 
 iam not a educated man but i do know a plane a helicopter or a balloon. ps hobart is north of altus oklahoma it has a air base so what i have seen was not of this world please respond to (item placed under field investigator special notes***)
content.summary: Scared fast round and not of this world.

content.detailedDescription: I was sky watching from my apartment and noticed an unusual craft flying low in the west.It was bright at first,looked like a big bright star but then it began to blink as it got closer i could see that it had several lights.It went over top my roof and i saw the underneath of it.I saw 1 red blinking light and 1 white blinking light and 5 white non blinking lights.My husband thought at first it was a helicopter because we saw one prior to this,but he left the room and didn't see it come down close.I tried to take pictures but my camera only picked up a glare from the window.This craft would sometimes be stationary,if it were the same craft as i reported that i saw over the school building.
content.summary: Diamond-shaped craft with 7 lights, sometimes blinking. it would move slow and be stationary.

content.detailedDescription: Looking on internet for pictures of the snow in mt. laguna. went to weather cam. looked thru photos westward direction . noticed on 2 photos monentary objects in the sky. first was a disk, 2nd, was a harrier type object.
content.summary: Harrier with large tubes  extending downward

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning home from the indianapolis area on 2//7/09.
we exited i-465 onto us 31 north around 9 pm. heading north a bright light
caught my eye to the west and a little behind my peripheral vision. as i continued to try to watch this light my first thought was that it was a passenger jet with landing lights on turning back to the airport. but it never turned. after about 10 minutes or so i told my wife to watch this light. this light appeared to be maybe 5 to 10 miles to the west and from my advantage at about 30 to 35 degrees from the horizon. as we continued north we observed this light move to the west at quite a distance to where the light was only a pinpoint of light or disappear completely. then after a couple of minutes it would come back to its original position. this happened numerous times. the farther north we went the light kept its same orientation. if it were a star, the light would continually fall farther behind us. as we approached the south side of kokomo the light disappeared completely. we never saw it again as we continued into miami county.
content.summary: Bright light in western sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 7:45 pm cst, my husband and i exited a hasting's here in lubbock. as we were walking to our vehicle, i looked up in the sky towards the east and saw a very bright spherical object about 50 degrees up. it was reminiscent of a very bright star or planet at first, but as we looked closer, we could actually see an object reflecting light very brightly. this was late summer, so it was just dusk outside, not yet dark. other people in the parking lot noticed the bright object as well. we watched it for a few minutes, and decided to go home, which was only about 3 minutes drive away.
as we parked in our driveway, we were facing north, so i had a clear view of it out the passenger window. the sky was darkening a little, but the object was still very bright. it seemed to be moving to the left ever so slightly. i decided to be able to estimate how big it was and just how far up it was, i would call my mother in clovis, nm and see if she could see it as well. clovis, nm is nw of lubbock, and approximately 95 miles away. my mother stepped outside into her backyard and looked toward the east, but slightly southernly, and could see the object in the sky as well. as the night sky darkened we all watched as the object faded and then disappeared. the event ended about 8:06 pm cst.
content.summary: Very bright reflective sphere shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
I can't recall the exact date of the event. i know it was springtime/early summer and i'm almost positive i was between 6 and 8 years old. probably closer to 8, so around 1990-1991. 

my brother and i were outside in the yard and noticed what at first just looked like 2 early evening stars until we saw them move closer together. one of them was still, almost like it had been there and waited for the other to get there. and not only were there no stars in the sky yet, but the objects were perfectly round and the light was pure white and uniform in clarity and brightness. no flickering, no fading. after a minute or two or three of not really thinking twice about it, we noticed the lights directly over us/our yard. we jumped on bikes and rode through the neighborhood to see where the lights would go. the lights followed and stopped directly above us in the middle of a cul-de-sac. after a couple minutes of watching, we could hear planes and within about 30 seconds we saw the planes come up over the tree line in the direction of the lights. and i can't remember how many planes. i believe as few as 3 and as many as 5. 

once most or all of the planes were in plain sight(a few seconds), the lights took off. from hovering still to a speed at least 1.5 times the speed of the planes in the blink of an eye(though maybe closer to 2 or 3 times the speed of the planes). like the objects defied any kind of law of acceleration or aerodynamics. the objescts disappeared behind a treeline adjacent to where the planes had come from and that was the last we saw. 

i wish i had reported this earlier, but am glad i found somewhere to do it now. i'm also very curious as to whether anyone in my area saw the same or similar lights that day/evening.

thanks so much for your time and i apologize for a somewhat clowdy recollection of what happened. 

-tim ruckel
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 lights in the sky seemed to be following our activity.

content.detailedDescription: N
content.summary: I

content.detailedDescription:
Standing at my closed hotel window at the fallsview casino hotel
on 6/02/08 monday morning a 6:35 am i took 2 pics of the falls
just seconds apart because it was just a nice sunny morning and 
the view was great.When i got home and uploaded the pics to my
computer i notice this object below the falls and in the mist.
the window was clear and no spots on my camera.I made some enhancement 
of the object and it was clear to me this was not a seagul or a
helicopter.But i sent the photo to canada's civil air dept.To see
if a violation of a helicopter had incured.Even though i did not
see or hear a helicopter that day.
im sending canada's respone to my photo and my original pic and
some of my enhancements....The object has this right angle probe
jutting out of the top of this thing ....You decide....Darryl
content.summary: Pic taken at the horseshoe falls canada

content.detailedDescription:
I was around 9 or 10 years old and i remember it was a nice day but i was stil in school so i know it had to have been spring  a friend and i were in my room and funny we were talking about ufos from what i can remember i had just gotten into them and something told me to look out the window and when i drew the curtain back there right not even a foot above a telephone pole was a silver shaped disc no sound at all and it was just hovering over the pole i looked and looked again  and i asked my friend to look he got excited and so did i and we went running into the dinning room screaming to my mother to come look she got excited and wanted to go around the back through the back yard to look at it i can't remember if she looked out the window and then we went or she took our word for it ?
by the time we reached out of the back door and on to the patio there it was over our neighbors roof these were one story houses and very close together and we just kinda stood there watching it hover it looked like liquid sliver not bolts or seems no doors or windows anywhere on it i remember looking very carefully for those things. then we stood there for about 5 min just staring at it i could have thrown a rock and hit it thats how close it was the day was bright and clear as a bell.
there were 4 of us my mother , little brother and my friend from across the street 
my mother went over and climbed the fence we had a over lapping wooden privacy fence she climbed it as this was going on i noticed that it had lights pulsating around the middle they were on and slowly going round it it was slowly very slowly turning but yet looked almost at a stand still just floating about only a few feet from the roof peak and kinda at a tilt .
as my mother climbed the fence she reached out to it why i don't know she never has said but,as she reached up to it as she did we (the three kids just stood there at that point silent watching )
then i don't know why it started turning faster like picking up it's rotating speed but not real fast and the lights picked up their rotation speed at this point i guess it hit me my mother is right under it and i remembered from either reading or something just told me to and i calmly called over to my mother if you don't bother them mom they wont bother us she then turned her head and looked back at me and realized what she was doing but i still don't remember being that scared really just cautious maybe i don't know she ran back to us kids and because she did so i think that scared us more then the disc being so close did and then we ran back into the house just into the door and stopped for like a second then then my mother and i looked at each other and smiled real big like we can't miss this call us crazy we ran back out to see what it would do next by this time it was hovering over our back yard but by this time it was up higher in the sky and it just stayed there hovering for a few minutes like it new we were coming back out and we looked up and started to wave at it we new it was leaving at this point don't ask me why and all of a sudden it shot straight up into the sky like a bullet and disappeared  into the sky  and thats my first encounter we didn't take a picture because we didn't have film at the time and decided not to report it cause back then you only had as far as we knew the police or the military to reported it and i told my mother not to call them 
i am now 43 years old and have seen many since then day night time not as close but with in the area i have lived within a 10 to 12 year period basically 4 more since i'll never forget it
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: This is one of many different types i have had

content.detailedDescription: This is my second time reporting this to mufon, but there is definately something going on in my own backyard, whenever my family and i see these paticular lights it is usually around the same time each time between 6pm and 6:15pm and ends around 11pm and 1pm or maybe longer. this light is very brilliant and i have ruled out that it is a planet or some type of satelite etc; we see this brilliant beautiful sparkling light that changes colors and appears to move just slightly. please note this is the 3rd time we have seen these lights and each time, especially tonight, we saw multiple planes/jets flying near and around its path, once planes got closer the object seemed to disappear before, but tonight we decided to do a little more investigation and we wanted to get in the car and drive to get a better clearer look, when to our surprise once we got into the object was in the front of our home instead of in back, we were assuming before that it was disappearing when in actuality it was moving to the front as soon as the planes attempted to get closer. also tonight was more amazing than the previous times we had seen the object, because we actually saw the object do a zig zag type of movement when the planes/jets get closer. never in my life have i seen at least 4 planes/jets near each other trying to get near this thing!!!! it was so hard to believe we were actually watching this happen. then all of a sudden another light came from behind the trees and appeared to be rising and we thought it may be another jet but it was going so fast and rising from a very low point. it was going at a rapid speed and i tried to follow it with binoculars but couldn't keep up. but what i did see was a bright light gliding up and it didn't have any type of wing span and then all of a sudden it just too off!!  i want to cal someone so bad to ask what is going on with all these planes surrounding this thing, but i don't know who to contact to see if in fact the planes/jets are chasing something or trying to get a better view of what is going on, but i have no idea who to call about this at all without sounding crazy, any suggestions? it seems like the objects are coming more often now, and there is still the mystery of the strange footprints that were in our back yard in late december and early january.
content.summary: Saw a bright light in the sky around 6pm and it keeps dissappearing, and there have been planes flying near the site all night.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north and noticed object to my left and above me as it passed heading north towards kentucky then disappeared behind ridge.I also noticed a plane heading east and as object passed the plane it seemed to be at a lower altitude and much larger than the plane.
 the object was a dull blue/green color,not as bright as a meteor or fireball but it was leaving a vapor trail of the same color but it didn't appear to be smoke or fire and object didn't appear to be on fire either,just a dull glow.
 the object was traveling at a very high rate and in a straight line and within about 7 to 10 seconds was out of sight.It wasn't dropping out of the sky but was on a parallel course to the ground as it passed me and sustained the same altitude or though it seems.I didn't see it breaking up or any falling debris as it passed by.
 i knew about the sat. collisions from a few days ago and thought that might be what it was but it seemed to be too large for it to be wreckage.There was no contrails of smoke that lingered after wards either. not sure what it was.
content.summary: Large dull blue/green object traveling north.

content.detailedDescription:
1. the ufo was a dark blob shaped like  a sony playstation controller.

2. i was looking out from a hotel room overlooking waikiki and noticed an object hovering over or just past diamond head.  diamond head was in the distance and the object's distance was difficult to determine.


diamond head:   21.262181, -157.806759
looking from 21.281657, -157.838323

3. i was assuming it was a chinook helicopter because i saw them fly over aloha stadium just before  the pro bowl kickoff.

4. the dark video game console controller-shaped object hovered over diamond head with two objecs either tehtered or staying to different sides of the object. it hovered over diamond head for about a minute then moved out over the pacific.  it disappeared in the distance while looking toward this direction:  21.248582, -157.859373.  it moved slowly at first but must have picked up speed because in the distance it became a small dot at about 45 degrees from our vantage point in a few minutes.

5. it didn't look identifiable but i felt it was close enough where i'd be able to identify anything i was familiar with. i could have at least narrowed it down to helicopter, fix wing aircraft, etc.  i went for the camera after it had started moving west.  it floated straight out into the pacific. it seemed to stay stationary as it became smaller.  i realized that i captured it on film and more shots wouldn't be amy better since detail would be worse.

 someone on the beach was pointing at it shortly after noticing it over diamond head.

i took images with a 7.1 megapixel camera with a 4x optical and 16x digital zoom.  the first two shots are at zero magnification . the rest of the shots were on full zoom (and the object had moved fairly far from it's hover point).   if i had the camera ready earlier i believe i would have had a better picture. 

6. i lost site when it became a small dot at about 45 degrees from my vantage point.  it became too small to distinguish.

if it was a chinook helicopter, it appeared as it went to the edge of space.
content.summary: Waikiki -ufo over diamond head

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside to have a cigarette, and noticed a glow  traveling due south about 45 degrees above the horizon. it proceeded to fall glowing a bright silver color, with no other color at an unusually slow rate. after about 1.5 seconds it began to dim and then the intense glow faded to see a remnant traveling for another .5-.7 seconds towards the treeline behind the water tower.
    the trajectory appeared to be heading into the east side over charlotte, and from my astronomy background appeared unusual because of the relative speed and color. i seemed about 1/2 the speed of most meteor objects and the duration of visibility after burning also lasted for a longer period. the color was an intense white light that would be a magnitude 5 times brighter than jupiter ( which is visible just after sunset in the east currently around 7 pm).
    this could have been a very large meteor that did not burn completely, and the remains may have reached earth east to south east of charlotte. this however appeared to be at a slower speed, possibly close to a speed of a visible manmade satellite. [there has been recent news coverage of a  2 satellite collision last week (maybe around tuesday- wednesday). also there has been coverage of close range asteroids that were found last autumn, and several large objects that entered the atmosphere last october-november 2008. also, i saw one of these on 10/31/08 at 2:58 am and the color was yellow amber with a faster speed and longer visible duration which appeared to break into several pieces].
 what i saw this morning was different than normal in speed and color from previous experiences with meteor phenomenon, and may be part of recent satellite
activity. what i thought was most interesting was that it occurred in charlotte airspace, and could have been spotted on radar.
content.summary: White flame fireball southern sky

content.detailedDescription: I went outside tonight at about 7:45pm to look at the sky since it was very clear. i saw a number of planes and sattelites. all the planes had some combination of red and green lights with strobes and the sattelites were just faint little points of lights (like small stars) moving in one direction. at about 8:15 pm i saw a dull orange sphere of light as i was facing south, the object was moving west to east at about 30 degrees above the horizon. it appeared to be uniform in color and moving at a relatively slow speed. it's size was about a 1/4 of a fingernail at arms length. i observed for a bout 2 min before it went out of view behind some trees. i saw 3 other aircraft fly that same general path and they were all identifiable as aircraft having red/green lights with strobes. this one was obviously different. i have never seen a ufo before and certainly not one that i would consider extraterestrial and i'm not sure this one classifies as such but it was different than all other aircraft that i witnessed tonight and i truly don't know what it was. the only reason i am reporting this is because it matches a report from somebody near the east coast. i didn't have my camera, so no pics, sorry.
content.summary: Dull orange ball of light moving relatively slow about 30` above the horizon

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1:00 am on february 16, 2009, i was sitting on the side of my house with my boyfriend. i looked above my neighbor���s house and in the northern sky we noticed something odd. i am used to seeing airplanes pass over the houses but this was no airplane. there were stationary 2 lights in the sky. they appeared to be very high in the sky. i watched them for a few minutes assuming they would move, they did not. the stayed still and blinked a white light. the light on the right side blinked about 5 times very quickly, and then the second would do the same as if answering back. this conversation happened about 4 times.  after the blinking stopped the two lights moved to the center and appeared to join.  they paused for a few seconds and quickly sped off upward into the dark sky. while this was happening it was silent outside. my boyfriend and i both agree these couldn���t have been regular planes. the way in which they acted was very odd.
content.summary: Two ufos blinking conversation, joining, and speeding off

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the kitchen window and saw an object come down into the yard near my husband and son as they were working in the yard.  i don't remember much else about the events that took place, but after many years, i was finally able to get my husband and son (both deceased) to tell me what happened to them.
content.summary: Watched an object come down through a kitchen window.

content.detailedDescription: I was sky watching, when i saw a bright(but not nearly as bright as venus is)star-like light appear over top the school building across the street at 8:30pm on feb.16 2009.It began to slowly raise up, then stayed still for about 15 minutes over the school.It would brighten,then dim during this time.After about 15 minutes it began to very slowly head east across the area,and proceding upwards.It also began to blink.I waslooking out my big family room window,and when i saw it-i felt compelled to talk to it.Very curious as to what shape it really was upclose.
content.summary: Bright,stationary,star-like light over top of school building for aprox.15mins.Then very slowly took off,and began to blink.

content.detailedDescription: While waiting to turn left off roosevelt road onto 31, i looked to my right and saw what i thought at first to be a tower in the distance.. northeast. i saw what appeared to be 3 or 4 bright white lights but i could not make out the shape of the object.  i realised that the towers in the area had red lights and it struck me as weird that i had never seen anything in that part of the sky before. it was quite big and and odd, probably a half mile or so away. i turned right onto 31 south in an attempt to see it more clearly. as i got closer looking to my left i saw it was a rectangular shape and i thought i saw something underneath it as well. but, i was driving and could not take my eyes off the road long enough to sharpen my focus. as i turned left onto miller road, it began to move slowly down and away from me. i began to lose my visual because of trees,etc. .When i looked back again it was gone.  i pulled over and searched the sky and saw nothing. i did this 2 more times as i slowly drove miller road. the night was clear and as it darkened i saw a fair amount of stars, including a planet. i have never seen anything like the object. the lights seemed peculiar to me as well.   they did not blink. and they were quite bright. and i was aware of no sound coming from it. mj
content.summary: Saw an unusal large object with several white lights hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my brother's house in whitinsville, mass.  as i approached my vehicle to place my belongings in the back seat, my attention was drawn to the sky to my right by a very bright star.  i'm a city-dweller, so i just assumed the stars are brighter in this rural area.  but it was still much, much brighter than anything else in the sky.  i finished placing my belongings in the back seat, and when i looked back up at the object, it was dimming.  i watched and within 30 seconds, it became very bright again.  i went to ask my brother to come out a take a look, which he did.  his first reaction was, "it's a star."  i told him to wait, and sure enough, it dimmed to the brightness of a normal star.  then it got very bright again.  i estimate the cycle of bright to dim to bright as being about 1 minute in duration.  we watched it for about 10 minutes until we got too cold.  we observed planes fly well above this object.  we heard no noise.  my brother says the object was in the north sky.  it did not appear to move at all.  i think it was quite strange and wanted to let you know about it.  as i was leaving, i asked my brother to try to take some pictures.  i will forward them if he took some.
content.summary: Fixed light in sky, very bright, then dim, then bright, repeating

content.detailedDescription:
I just saw a not-blinking bright orange light move across the sky from almost horizon-to-horizon... i was pointing at it to my brother... i saw 2 aircraft with normal blinking lights in the sky at the same time...
just another cover-up, lol...  but *i* saw this one!!!

home, watching my bro go home...

it didn't blink, and was orange... most planes are blinking red/ green/white...

i thought it was a plane, but it didn't blink.

it moved in a straight line, at a constant speed... i was wondering if it was a satilite, at first, but now i'm thinking it was going way too fast for that (i could be wrong?)

i saw it, when i went outside to watch my brother leave my house to go home. i live in a 'bad' neighborhood. as i was standing in my driveway, it was a clear night and i could finally see some stars, so i looked, and saw this bright orange non-blinking light moving across the sky.
my brother was just into his car and was warming up his engine, i guess, but i pointed up at it, not knowing if he saw me or not (it's dark here, atm...) i also looked around the sky at that time and saw *2* other 'normal' aircraft with blinking lights, in 2 different directions...

i called him a little while later and asked him if he saw what i was pointing at, and he said, 'no', he was doing other things at the time...

i lost sight when it was behind one of my neighbors houses... the whole view lasted about 45 seconds? no blinking, bright orange light...

thx, peeps.... be well   8)
content.summary: Bright orange, non-blinking light moving nw to ne across sky...

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
We were at home and i went out on the garage stoop to have a cigarette.  i had seen a strange light in the sky for more than an hour, but assumed it was an airplane as we are in the flight pattern of indianapolis airport flights.  after i went back out and noticed it was still in the same location, i thought maybe i should look closer.  i came into the house to get my hd camcorder and returned outside where my wife joined me.  we proceeded to film the object and within a minute of starting to film, the object shot off further into the southern/southwestern sky at a very high rate of speed (i.E. in the blink of an eye).  we both observed this behavior through the viewfinder of the camera.  the object then slowly started coming closer to us again as you will see in the film.  during this time, it changes from a fiery object into a dim diamond.  

when we saw the object shoot off at a high rate of speed, we knew we were not looking at an identifiable terrestrial craft.  this caused us to come a bit concerned, but we did not feel threatened.  after i came into the house to find a tripod, i returned outdoors and the object had disappeared completely.  please take a look at the video.  it is not clear to me what images might be created from chromatic aberrations or other digital video artifacts, but it is *very* clear that the object moved at an extremely high rate of speed.  i do have the original footage recorded at 1080p.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=trc-60lpvuc

best, l
content.summary: Stationary light in sky changing colors which then moved very quickly http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=trc-60lpvuc

content.detailedDescription: We have been watching a ufo for 6 days in a row now.  we first saw it last tuesday as a really bright light in the western sky over our mountains.  it starts out high in the sky at around 6:15.  it slowly moves closer to the horizon, occasionally adjusting it's altitude every once in a while.  the first night it was the only light in the sky because there were alot of clouds and very bright. my husband went outside at maybe around 7:00pm, he immediatly thought it was a ufo.  we looked at it through binoculars and could see a metallic craft.  we watched it until it went behind the hill in our view, around 8:21.  it was pretty easy to see because it was the day after a full moon.  after it went behind the hill, we got in our car and drove into town.  we could still see it, we drove toward it until it turned out it's light and it was gone.  every night since then, it has reappeared faithfully at 6:15. it is very easy to see because it's still pretty light at that time.  we watch it with binoculars until 8:21.  the first few nights, it slowly moved down, but the last few nights it has been moving all over the place when it gets close to the horizon. it goes side to side up and down and does a wierd little circular movement as it moves sideways.  we did take some pictures but our camera isn't that good.  have tried to get better pictures by friends who have good cameras, but they are not wanting to believe our story, so we haven't found anyone to take any good pictures.  i have been keeping a detailed journal for every night we have been watching it since it started. my husband reported it to our local newspaper, but he felt they didn't take him seriously, he also called the police the first night, but again felt they didn't take him seriously.  we can see it with binoculars, it has been there six nights in a row that we know about.  we feel it is kinda crazy that it's right there in plain sight for such a long time and no one really seems all that interested. i have watched it for a total of 12+ hours now.
content.summary: Very bright light in the sky, when we looked at it through binoculars, we can see a metallic object.  first saw ufo day after the full moon.  so pretty easy to see.  we have been watching it for 6 days now.  always appears at 6:15.

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming in my back yard for birds
i set my camera on a tripod and let it
run on its own. for 1hour and when i played
it back i cought a few different objects
one object is on film at 11mins 14sec.
one at 12mins 20sec.

i was excited when i first saw it.

the first object just popped onthe screen
and than popped off at 11mins. 14sec.

the next one flew in to view than backed up
than flew forward at the sun as it turned
out of the sunlight it went up out of sight
content.summary: I was tring to video birds and cought somthing else
